name: NewsCycle: A news article app that allows the user to quickly cycle through articles.  The user can then read them, share them or save them for later.
Work Day Scheduler: A calendar app that allows you to schedule hourly appointments during the current day.
Artist Hop: A web application designed to help the user discover new musical artists based upon artists they already know.  Search for a band/artist and then discover artists related to that search.
Note Taker: A simple Notepad application that uses an array in a .json file to store notes.
Burger App: A simple MVC app that utilizes Handlebars.  The user can create a burger and then click to 'Eat it'.
PuckMan Chase: A simple HTML game using a physics engine (Planck).  The object of the game is for the player to avoid the asteroids for as long as possible.
